scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:public && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:public: cd public && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../public && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:public"
